TargetEvolutionMandateManifest.json.description: Defines the mandated high-level evolution target state.

AtomicDeploymentManifest.json.description: Defines elemental changes for atomic application, typically optional if TEMM covers low-level actions.

ProjectedVectorLoadManifest.json.description: Artifact listing system load changes based on TEMM.

TransitionSecurityContext.yaml.description: Security context required for GSEP execution, must be YAML.
